description: This quick stir-fry makes the most of leafy seasonal produce and is best served with fluffy rice.
keywords: Roast pork,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pork & Spring Greens Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 350g pork fillet, cut into thin strips

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a wok over a medium-high heat. Add the pork and stir-fry for about 5 minutes, moving it around the wok as it heats up.

Add the garlic and greens and continue to stir-fry over a medium-high heat for 1 minute, or until the greens have just wilted. Add the onion seeds, stir to combine, then season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.
